name: Aqua-Marines
description:
Have you ever wanted to commit a mass genocide of fish using harmless bubbles? Then this game is just for you!

This game features:

  • Fish
  • More fish
  • Store upgrades
  • Even more fish
  • And more!

And remember, have fun!

Actual game Features:
  • Upgrades
  • Bossfights
  • Unique, randomized waves
  • Autosaves
  • Controller support
CONTROLS: WASD/Arrow keys: Movement Spacebar: Shooting
